name: df-cmn
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(ccmn, crab(s0, cmnd, wral(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wral(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))))
comment: Define class of all commutative monoids. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2015.)
